creator: jkb@stian.freeserve.co.uk
text:
The icons in the test tree display in the left hand panel are very useful, but 
the icon names are hard-coded; also the same icon is sometimes used for several 
different items, eg all controllers use the same icon, whether they are Simple, 
Once Only, Loop etc. It might be useful to distinguish these - e.g. maybe the 
OnceOnly controller could have the digit "1" in it.

If this is thought to be useful, I should be able to contribute code patches 
for at least some of this, but graphics are not my strong point ...

creator: sebb@apache.org
text: Icons can now be changed via jmeter.properties
